budgets.description: List active cases for seeded tenant workloads
budgets.query: select id, status, created_at from cases where tenant_id = $1 and status = $2 order by created_at desc limit $3

budgets.description: Audit feed fetch with date cursor
budgets.query: select tenant_id, actor, action, created_at from audit_log where tenant_id = $1 and created_at > $2 order by created_at desc limit $3

budgets.description: Status updates issued during seed runs
budgets.query: update cases set status = $1, updated_at = now() where id = $2
